quote: I will fight, I will fail but giving up is a privilege I do not have.
author: Lee Sin

quote: In a world without love, death means nothing.
author: Viego

quote: When I look at the top of the mountain, in my mind I have already failed, that's when I start climbing.
author: Pantheon

quote: Fight and be remembered as heroes or die and be remembered as cowards.
author: Aatrox

quote: Tell me once again all the crimes I committed, and I will tell you the price of victory.
author: Swain

quote: Varus, V, A, R, U, S, your name should have a letter A and then another letter A Varus, a statement has been sent Varus, A statement!.
author: Sr.toxic
